resbar_metal_income_tooltip:
Your metal income.
Gained from metal extractors, overdrive and reclaim.
resbar_energy_income_tooltip:
Your energy income.
Gained from power plants.
resbar_metal_bar_tooltip:
Represents your storage capacity. Filled portion is used storage.
Flashes if maximum storage is reached and you start wasting metal.
resbar_energy_bar_tooltip:
Represents your storage capacity. Filled portion is used storage.
Flashes if maximum storage is reached and you start wasting energy.
resbar_metal_expense_tooltip: Your metal demand. Construction and morph demand metal.
resbar_energy_expense_tooltip: This is this total energy demand of your economy and abilities which require energy upkeep.
